SEARCH

Uses of Package
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.tooluser

Packages that use nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.tooluser
Package
Description
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.managers
This package contains managers that manage different certain aspects of the plugin.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.structures
This package contains classes that define, manipulate, and manage structures.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.tooluser
Contains the classes for the tool users system.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.tooluser.creator
The creator package contains classes that are responsible for creating structures.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.structures.bigdoor
This package contains all the data for the big door structure type.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.structures.clock
This package contains all the data for the clock structure type.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.structures.drawbridge
This package contains all the data for the drawbridge structure type.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.structures.flag
This package contains all the data for the flag structure type.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.structures.garagedoor
This package contains all the data for the garage door structure type.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.structures.portcullis
This package contains all the data for the portcullis structure type.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.structures.revolvingdoor
This package contains all the data for the revolving door structure type.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.structures.slidingdoor
This package contains all the data for the sliding door structure type.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.structures.windmill
This package contains all the data for the windmill structure type.

    ToolUser
    This class is responsible for guiding the player through a process using the tool.

  • Classes in nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.tooluser used by nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.tooluser
    Class
    Description
    PowerBlockInspector
    Represents a type of ToolUser that tries to find powerblocks based on the locations provided by the user.
    PowerBlockRelocator
    Represents a tool user that relocates a powerblock to a new position.
    Step
    Represents a step in a Procedure.
    Step.Factory
    Factory class for new Step objects.
    Step.Factory.IFactory
    Nested factory used to create new Step.Factory instances.
    ToolUser
    This class is responsible for guiding the player through a process using the tool.
